Ok, I think Cyberwolf's back now.

::Slayer::

Slayer recieves Ignatius's transmission and speeds up, heading for his
teammate's signal, seeing a dragon chasing him as he nears.

"Fire on the bot chasing Ignatius," he says to Zoe, firing two
missiles at Necromancer.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius flew back and forth through the mountains trying to lose
his
> Maximal pursuer. He returned Slayers signal with "Fly in my
direction, when
> you pick up my signal open fire full force." He didn't know if thier
weapons
> would hurt the monster but he knew that if they didn't do something
his tail
> was cooked in more ways than one.
> 
> Necromancer continued pursuit snapping at the Eagles tail whenever
he got
> close enough. The dragon was playing a game of aerial cat and mouse,
it
> would continue until either he got bored or until they reached the
CF.
